about.text2: Moin, I am a web developer from Hamburg, the pearl of Germany.
about.text3: Ever since I first heard the beeping sound of a 56k modem, I was fascinated by the internet. I created my first website when I was 14 and computer science was my favourite subject next to art. What fascinates me about programming is that as a developer you always learn something new and solve complex problems in a team.
about.text4: In my free time, I like to put on my Nikes and go running. I also like going to concerts and festivals.

skills.heading: Skills
skills.text1: 'Swearing is the only language that every programmer knows.'

contact.heading: Contact
contact.text1: If you are curious, please contact me.

footer.date_morning: Good morning! Today is {{date, DATE_HUGE}} | Have a nice day!
footer.date_evening: Good evening! Today was the {{date, DATE_HUGE}}
